Greetings to Ukrainian prime minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Ukrainian prime minister 
    Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, premier of the DPRK cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Ukrainian prime minister Anatoly Kinakh on the occasion of its National Day. 
 In the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop on good terms in the future, too, the message wished him greater success in his work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Ukrainian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Ukrainian President 
     Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Ukrainian President Leonid Kuchma on the occasion of its National Day.
 The message extended warm congratulations to the president, government and people of Ukraine and wished him greater success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country and the wellbeing of the people.    
 It expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Ukraine would grow stronger in the interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: Greetings to S.C., General People's Congress of Yemen
articles.content:
Greetings to S.C., General People's Congress of Yemen
    Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea yesterday sent a message of greetings to the Standing Committee of the General People's Congress of Yemen on its 20th anniversary.
 The message said that the congress has realized national unity by strengthening itself and achieved great progress in the efforts to build a new democratic society over the last two decades since its foundation.    
 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties would continue to develop in the idea of independence, peace and friendship, it wished the congress greater success in its activities for its growth and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Message of sympathy to Slovak President
articles.content:
Message of sympathy to Slovak President
    Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, today sent a message of sympathy to Rudolf Schuster, President of the Republic of Slovakia, in connection with an unprecedentedly disasterous torrential rain that hit its various parts, causing a huge material loss.
 The message expressed deep sympathy and consolation to the president and, through him, to the government and the people of Slovakia in the afflicted areas.    
 It hoped that the president and the government would achieve success in their efforts to eradicate the aftereffect of the disaster and bring the living of the people in the areas to normal as early as possible.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il meets with Putin
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Putin
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Putin
    Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Russian President V.V. Putin presented a gift to Kim Jong Il, Chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, on a visit to the Far Eastern region of the Russian Federation.
 The gift was conveyed by an official concerned.

articles.title: Dinner in honor of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Dinner in honor of Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Russian President V.V. Putin gave a dinner in honor of Kim Jong Il, Chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, on a visit to the Far Eastern region at the state guest house in Vladivostok Friday evening.
 The dinner proceeded in a cordial atmosphere overflowing with the feelings of friendship.
